pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Charge Amps API bindings for PythonThis repository contains a Python module for the Charge Amps' electric vehicle charging stations.The module is developed by [Kirei AB](https://www.kirei.se) and is not supported by [Charge Amps AB](https://charge-amps.com).## External API KeyYou need an API key to use the Charge Amps external API. Contact [Charge Amps Support](mailto:support@charge-amps.com) for extensive API documentation and API key.## References- [Charge Amps External REST API](https://eapi.charge.space/swagger/)
